messages.subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Dick, Jane, Spot and Puff Guilty of Situational Ethics and
messages.msgSnippet: ... I think your right Johanna, but did not want to speak for Christians.  Thanks for adding your opinion as a Christian homeschooler. Nanci K. (Pagan Mom,
messages.messageBody:
>I read this post and did not interpret to say all
>Christians. I have seen tis series marketed towards
>fundamental christians for the purpose of
>character education. If they are read as a model
>without thinking things through, it could cause some
>gross prejudices and i think that was the point of
>the essay

I think your right Johanna, but did not want to speak
for Christians. Thanks for adding your opinion as a
Christian homeschooler.

Nanci K. (Pagan Mom, Unschooler, Wife, and zookeeper
for 2 preschool boys!)
